info.name: SPO REST API (AAD app)
info.description:
# Azure AD App-Only

## Azure app

### 1) Go to: [Azure Active Directory App registrations](https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/~/RegisteredApps)

- Name the app (e.g., "Postman app").
- In the **Redirect URI (optional)** field, select `Web` and enter `https://oauth.pstmn.io/v1/callback`.
- Note down the `Application (client) ID` and `Directory (tenant) ID`.
- Create a `Client secret` under **Certificates & secrets** and make a note of it.
- In the **API Permissions** section, add permissions for SharePoint, specifically the **Delegated permission** called `Sites.FullControl.All`.
- Grant admin consent for the permissions or request it from an Azure administrator.
    

## Postman variables

Go to the Variable tab and enter current a new, where:

- TenantId: Use the value of `Directory (tenant) ID` that you noted down earlier.
- ClientId: Use the value of `Application (client) ID` that you noted down earlier.
- HostName: Enter your part of the site URL, such as `https://yourtenant.sharepoint.com/`.
- ClientSecret: Use the `Client secret` that you created in the Certificates & secrets section.
    

Make sure to replace the placeholder values with the actual values specific to your Azure AD application and SharePoint site configuration.
